nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Thunderlord VII\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Every \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"3 \",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\"hits on a monster,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"strike \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"lightning\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\", dealing\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"60% \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"of the hit's damage.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"VII: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Dungeons\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Sword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Fishing Weapon\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Longsword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Gauntlet\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Conflicts:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Thunderbolt\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
